mapper.select: with T01 as ( select C.username, C.name, C.subsection_name, C.section_name from ( select A.*, B.subsection_name, B.section_name from users A left join ( select A.id, A.name subsection_name, B.name section_name from subsection A left join section B on A.section_id = B.id ) B on A.subsection_id = B.id where 1=1 and A.status = 1 ) C ), T02 as ( select T.id, t.device_name, t.record_type, t.it_user_code, it_user.name AS it_user_name, t.pic_code, A.name location_name, pic_user.name AS pic_name, t.date, pic_user.section_name, pic_user.subsection_name, t.remark from is_device_transaction T join T01 it_user ON T.it_user_code = it_user.username join T01 pic_user ON t.pic_code = pic_user.username left join is_device_location A on T.location_id = A.id ) select A.*, T02.record_type, T02.it_user_code, T02.it_user_name, T02.pic_code, T02.location_name, T02.pic_name, T02.date, T02.section_name, T02.subsection_name, T02.remark transaction_remark, CASE WHEN record_type = 'IN' THEN 'Nhận lại' WHEN record_type = 'OUT' THEN 'Bàn giao' END AS record_type_name from is_device A left join T02 on A.transaction_id = T02.id
SELECT A.username, concat(A.username, ' - ', A.name) code_name FROM users A where status = 1

with -- Thông tin master (user, section) T01 as ( select C.username, C.name, C.subsection_name, C.section_name, C.subsection_code, C.section_code from ( select A.*, B.subsection_name, B.section_name, B.section_code, B.subsection_code from users A left join ( select A.id, A.name subsection_name, A.code subsection_code, B.name section_name, B.code section_code from subsection A left join section B on A.section_id = B.id ) B on A.subsection_id = B.id where 1=1 and A.status = 1 ) C ), -- Thông tin transaction T02 as ( select A.*, it_user.name it_user_name, CASE WHEN A.record_type = 'IN' THEN 'Nhận lại' WHEN A.record_type = 'OUT' THEN 'Bàn giao' END record_type_name, pic_user.name pic_name, pic_user.section_name pic_section_name, pic_user.section_code pic_section_code, pic_user.subsection_name pic_subsection_name, pic_user.subsection_code pic_subsection_code from is_device_transaction A join T01 it_user on A.it_user_code = it_user.username join T01 pic_user on A.pic_code = pic_user.username ) select * from T02 order by T02.id desc

SELECT A.*, B.name location_name, C.name created_by_name, D.type device_type FROM is_device_inventory_data A left join is_device_location B on A.location_id = B.id left join users C on A.created_by = C.username left join is_device D on A.device_name = D.name where 1=1 and A.request_id = #{requestId}
